attributes.title: Viva Aerobus
attributes.portfolioDescription: The perfect partner for your trip

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.content: Viva Aerobus is one of the largest low-cost airline in Mexico. It has over one million passengers monthly, and is the fastest-growing airline globally. We were tasked to develop a best-in-class digital experience for its customers across the world. Our team was able to enhance and simplify the airline booking experience in a responsive, fast and well integrated website.

list.title: A truly native experience
list.content: Creating a truly native browsing experience, was top priority for Viva. Our team combined multiple coding languages and methods to achieve this. This way, accessing the website from whichever device and browser, always feels like an “app-like” intuitive experience.

list.title: Increased Conversions
list.content: Thanks to the creation of custom modules, Viva Aerobus can easily add new (informative) pages for promotions, services and brand content, saving them valuable time.

list.title: Rapid Deployment
list.content: Changes, and new functionalities for Viva's website are continously deployed in a rapid and secure way, through use of Gitlab and Amazon Web Services (AWS).

keyFeatures.title: Real-time information
keyFeatures.content: Do your check-in, view flight delays and other key alerts, all from the home screen. Get direct access to your boarding pass travel info and other contextual actions.

keyFeatures.title: Rich profile management
keyFeatures.content: Save important travel information such as travel documents, companions, and preferred payments methods for upcoming trips.

keyFeatures.title: Easy navigation
keyFeatures.content: Intuitive flows, a modular deisgn system and a micro-animations make navigation a breeze. Users also have direct shortcuts to the most important app sections.

keyFeatures.title: Bespoke system experiences
keyFeatures.content: We created two distinct apps, which take into account native components and navigation patterns for each OS. We were able to create a fast and effective way for travelers to manage their flights.

keyFeatures.title: Super easy boarding pass
keyFeatures.content: The boarding pass can be used even when the app is offline, making boarding with a mobile boarding pass easy and possible at all times.

quote.body: For us, having a fast, reliable and delightful web experience is essential to grow our business. Umvel has been a great development partner in making this come true.

client.name: Pablo Gómez Gallardo
client.title: Chief Digital Officer at Viva Aerobus

whatWeLearned.title: What we learned
whatWeLearned.content: For Viva Aerobus, we developed and deployed a native digital browsing experience for its new website, that's future-proof in all possible ways, and enables Viva to make changes and add new pages independently. During the process, we ensured a continuous and constructive relationship with the Viva team, achieving complete alignment with all stakeholders.

attributes.title: Viva Aerobus Web
attributes.portfolioDescription: Digital revamp for a Mexican icon

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.content: Viva Aerobus is one of the largest low-cost airline in Mexico. It has over one million passengers monthly, and is the fastest-growing airline globally. We were tasked to develop a best-in-class digital experience for its customers across the world. Our team was able to enhance and simplify the airline booking experience in a responsive, fast and well integrated website.

list.title: A truly native experience
list.content: Creating a truly native browsing experience, was top priority for Viva. Our team combined multiple coding languages and methods to achieve this. This way, accessing the website from whichever device and browser, always feels like an “app-like” intuitive experience.

list.title: Increased Conversions
list.content: Thanks to the creation of custom modules, Viva Aerobus can easily add new (informative) pages for promotions, services and brand content, saving them valuable time.

list.title: Rapid Deployment
list.content: Changes, and new functionalities for Viva's website are continously deployed in a rapid and secure way, through use of Gitlab and Amazon Web Services (AWS).

keyFeatures.title: Easier booking
keyFeatures.content: Through an intuitive, well designed and fast booking experience, conversion has increased up to 15%.

keyFeatures.title: New homepage
keyFeatures.content: An easier journey, news alerts and a responsive cross-browser experience.

keyFeatures.title: Simplified Adds-ons
keyFeatures.content: Easily understand what you're paying for and add only what you need.

keyFeatures.title: Look and Feel
keyFeatures.content: The website offers a new look and feel, in line with Viva's new branding.

keyFeatures.title: Content management
keyFeatures.content: The Viva team can easily manage content and or remove pages, in seconds.

quote.body: For us, having a fast, reliable and delightful web experience is essential to grow our business. Umvel has been a great development partner in making this come true.

client.name: Pablo Gómez Gallardo
client.title: Chief Digital Officer at Viva Aerobus

whatWeLearned.title: What we learned

During the process, we ensured a continuous and constructive relationship with the Viva team, achieving complete alignment with all stakeholders.

attributes.title: Planet Buyback
attributes.portfolioDescription: Helping the planet, one donation at a time

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.content: Umvel was tasked to rethink, redesign, and improve the planet buyback platform and produce a new digital experience stimulates people to donate to charities. We assisted Planet Buyback in simplifying their experience by integrating best in class UX, visual design and storytelling in order to retain and boost donations for projects that help our planet heal.

list.title: An new project dashboard experience
list.content: The donation dashboard provides a consistent, visual design in line with Planet Buyback's brand guidelines. It informs and attracts new users to donate in a simple and effective way.

list.title: Enticing data visualization
list.content: We kept a close relationship between textual and visual storytelling in order to match content, with form. Images, icons, and animations support and reinforce the main value proposition.

list.title: Brand new interface design
list.content: The new interface design followed from a market study and an overall brand revamp; this defined the desired modifications in terms of forms, composition, hierarchy, and components.

keyFeatures.title: Easy subscription and community building
keyFeatures.content: To make it easier to subscribe, we provided a community in which people with similar interests can connect.

keyFeatures.title: Donation Dashboard
keyFeatures.content: A new and exciting way to donate to projects that heal and improve our planet. We made it fun and exciting to donate - and low the barrier to do so.

keyFeatures.title: Fully responsive Design
keyFeatures.content: Whether on laptop or phone, the new Planet Buyback platform adapts to your device, ensuring an optimal experience at all times.

keyFeatures.title: Functional Animations
keyFeatures.content: As part of creating an enticing new experience, we introduced functional micro animiations across the website.

whatWeLearned.title: What we learned
whatWeLearned.content: Next to developing Viva Aerobus' website, Umvel was tasked to create a fun, convenient, and user-friendly mobile application. This app allows travelers to book and manage their trips in a variety of ways. We created the mobile digital strategy, the design, and all development, with a special focus on leveraging native iOS and Android features.

attributes.title: Cancer Buddy
attributes.portfolioDescription: Developing the first social network for cancer patients and survivors.

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.content: The Bone Marrow Cancer Foundation, a New York-based organization, envisioned Cancerbuddy as a free mobile app for cancer patients, survivors and caregivers to connect, share and help each other. This gives them strength during their treatment and recovery and reduces a feeling of loneliness or isolation. Umvel was tasked with development, testing and deployment of Cancerbuddy's iOS application, working together closely with our client and partners.

list.title: A hybrid mobile app
list.content: Cancerbuddy is built on a serverless framework; it's a hybrid app making it easy to scale to other platforms. We used the React Native framework, allowing us to easily build the app for iOS, Android and web, all with one codebase.

list.title: A fast and seamless experience
list.content: We used Amplify (an AWS service). This allows for fast and effective coding. It provides easy Authentication, data and API integration and the tools to help us authenticate users, connect services, build databases and web services, resulting in a fast and seamless end user experience.

list.title: A world's first
list.content: It's not everyday that we can work on an app that truly changes lives. Cancerbuddy is the world’s first cancer patient and survivor network and offers people that are affected by this disease a way to feel less isolated and supported by others.

keyFeatures.title: Group Modules
keyFeatures.content: Users can request access to moderated groups where they can discuss specific subjects, such as alliances, nutrition, exercise and survivors’ stories.

keyFeatures.title: Matching Algorithm
keyFeatures.content: We developed an algorithm that suggests relevant groups and users to connect with, based on similar experiences and background.

keyFeatures.title: Buddy Chat
keyFeatures.content: We built an integrated chat function for buddies to talk to each other and share stories or experiences.

keyFeatures.title: QR Code Sharing
keyFeatures.content: Through ‘buddy search’ users can share a QR code with others, that opens a direct profile link in the app. This makes it easy to find people.

keyFeatures.title: 3 Types of Users
keyFeatures.content: All 3 types of users (patients, survivors, care givers) have different permissions and roles in the app, taking into account their context and goals.

whatWeLearned.title: What we learned
whatWeLearned.content:
It’s not everyday that we can work on an app that truly changes lives. That’s why we were super excited to work on Cancerbuddy: the world’s first cancer patient and survivor network.

Cancer patients and survivors to connect, share and help each other. This application connects people who are fighting or have beaten cancer by accompanying them on their road to recovery.

attributes.title: Food Central
attributes.portfolioDescription: Digital transformation in the food marketplace industry

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.content:
Food Central is a food plaza with unique culinary options, serving to all people in the residential, corporate and commercial spaces inside a large Mexican building complex.

Umvel helped Food Central to develop a digital marketplace that gives its users the ability to order — and get delivered — any products they buy online.

list.title: Enabling providers to instantly digitize their business
list.content: By the use of a so-called “central table”, the system collects and organizes orders in a central place, making fulfillment more efficient.

list.title: All-in-one solution for restaurants
list.content: Users can pre-order food up to 24 hours before delivery and have a pick-up option if needed. This provides a great customer experience and makes it easy to plan the day ahead in an easy way.

list.title: Native iOS and Android experience
list.content: We have developed both a native iOS and Android experience, making the Food Central intuitive and easy to use.

keyFeatures.title: Manage performance and places
keyFeatures.content: We designed and developed an easy way to register (new) providers in Food Central, view performance reports, manage promotions and customers.

keyFeatures.title: All-in-one solution for restaurants
keyFeatures.content: Restaurants can easily track income trends, incoming payments and orders, register promotions and update menus.

keyFeatures.title: A native, easy to use app to order food
keyFeatures.content: A well designed native order app to browse restaurants, make and track orders and read reviews of all providers.

keyFeatures.title: Versatile SaaS solution
keyFeatures.content: Food Central is a SaaS solution that allows new providers and customes to onboard instantly, allowing for platform scalability.

keyFeatures.title: Centralized fulfillment
keyFeatures.content: By making the ordering system centralized, couriers and providers have the shortest and most efficient route to their customers.

quote.body: Creating and end-to-end digital platform is hard, but I’m surprised how easy and efficient the project went.

whatWeLearned.title: What we learned
whatWeLearned.content: We helped to design, build and operate a pioneering food plaza marketplace. This SaaS solution spans native client apps, a versatile admin portal, rich reporting and other useful features. Food Central is now live and can be used in Miyana, CDMX. We learned a tremendous amount about fulfillment, the food logistics industry and building flexible, digital marketplaces.

attributes.title: Smart Walk
attributes.portfolioDescription: An immersive real estate platform designed for brokers and visitors of GGI properties

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.content:
GGI is an innovative real estate development company, that manages more than 128 real estate properties and 1,500 commercial premises.

Umvel helped GGI to translate the best practices in physical real estate tours into a truly immersive digital platform, that helps brokers sell properties in digital first way.

list.title: Uptake of 10% in property viewings
list.content: GGI now has a new way to attract potential buyers who are interested in property and use SmartWalk to get a better impression of the space, before they decide to physically go.

list.title: Better relationships between broker and buyer
list.content: Because of the video and audio layer on top of the 3D tour, the broker can answer questions and provide a voice over while doing the tour.

list.title: New way to capture client data
list.content: Potential buyers can leave their personal data behind when signing up for SmartWalk, captured in a CRM system so that GGI can track its leads better.

keyFeatures.title: A complete Admin experience
keyFeatures.content: Register new brokers, team leaders, and properties in the GGI admin system.

keyFeatures.title: Broker management tool
keyFeatures.content: Centralized access to properties for brokers. Manage upcoming virtual and physical visits in brokers' calendars.

keyFeatures.title: An immersive experience
keyFeatures.content: A unique interactive visit experience, that provides the right assistance for brokers to make an amazing impression on the potential buyer.

keyFeatures.title: Seamless Matterport integration
keyFeatures.content: SmartWalk works with any Matterport file. Import a file with a click of a button and off you go.

keyFeatures.title: Real-time tours with video-conferencing
keyFeatures.content: During tours, brokers can communicate with buyers through a built-in video conferencing layer.

keyFeatures.title: Instant switching between properties
keyFeatures.content: Often, buyers want to see multiple properties at once. SmartWalk’s instant property switching makes this possible.

quote.body: We envisioned a product experience that would ‘wow’ people, and that’s what we got.

whatWeLearned.title: What we learned
whatWeLearned.content:
SmartWalk is a disruptive real estate platform, that empowers brokers to strengthen the client relationship. By offering virtual, immersive tools it helps potential buyers to make better decisions.

We have learned that a seamless user unboarding, rich ways of interaction and easy ways to capture user data, are key in creating a successful platform experience.

attributes.title: Seguros Mundial
attributes.portfolioDescription: A new digital experiene for both renter’s and owner’s insurance.

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.content:
Seguros Mundial is a large Colombian insurer. One of their biggest products is renter’s and owner’s insurance.

We were asked to digitize the quoting and contracting process, and help them implement a DevOps culture to better operate digital processess. Off we go!

list.title: 80% more effective operations
list.content: Thanks to the DevOps implementation we carried out, Seguros Mundial can execute operations with 80% more speed.

list.title: Fully digitized insurance process
list.content: Say goodbye to long paper trails! By digitizing the insurance experience, customers can quote and contract insurance products fully online. That’s a first in Seguros Mundial’s local industry.

list.title: Reducing operational costs with 20%
list.content: Thanks to a fully digital self service platform, the help of a broker is not required anymore. This greatly benefits the customer acquisition process, as operational costs go down while customer volume increases.

keyFeatures.title: Full DevOps implementation
keyFeatures.content: Resulting in an 80% more effective operations by digitizing development and deployment processes.

keyFeatures.title: 100% digital journeys
keyFeatures.content: From quoting, to file uploads, to final contract: both owner and renter can do everything online, without the help of a broker.

keyFeatures.title: Microservices Architecture Deployment
keyFeatures.content: Allowing for rapid code deployments and an overall lightweight architecture.

keyFeatures.title: A web-based platform
keyFeatures.content: The first local player to implement digital renter’s insurance, end-to-end – without using a broker.

keyFeatures.title: Best in class design
keyFeatures.content: By using best practices in UX and UI design, we provide a delighful, seamless insurance experience.

whatWeLearned.title: What we learned
whatWeLearned.content:
We designed, built and deployed new customer success journeys for Seguros Mundial. This made their operations 80% more effective, by offering a fully automated acquisition process, removing the need to work with an insurance broker.

We learned a lot about the insurance industry, business processes and rules, and how to turn a paper trail into a best-in-class digital experience.

attributes.title: OEIO
attributes.portfolioDescription: The first wellness marketplace in LATAM.

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.content: OEIO is a sports and wellness marketplace, that helps people achieve the best version of themselves. Easily book a spa treatment, yoga class or crossfit workout, in seconds. Umvel was asked to design, build and operate the entire ecosystem, which is the first marketplace of its kind in LATAM.

list.title: A versatile, digital wellness marketplace
list.content: OEIO offers all tools for customers, salon owners and managers, professionals and OEIO staff to book and manages appointments. All in one ecosystem.

list.title: Track and manage business growth
list.content: We’ve built an easy to use Admin SaaS platform, that serves native OEIO iOS and Android apps. It lets owners manage bookings, track sales, progress and employee performance.

list.title: End-to-end digital experience for customers
list.content: From discovery, to choosing a service, to booking, to payment: users can perform everything in-app, in the palm of their hands.

keyFeatures.title: An all-in-one solution
keyFeatures.content: Find the best places for many fitness and wellness services in your area, in the palm of your hand. Easier, better, faster.

keyFeatures.title: Reserve in seconds
keyFeatures.content: Pick and choose your favorite service, staff, date and hour without having to call or wait in line.

keyFeatures.title: Pay directly in-app
keyFeatures.content: The OEIO app generates a QR code, that allows customers to pay in-store, providing for a true end-to-end booking experience.

keyFeatures.title: Track performance and growth
keyFeatures.content: Salon owners can easily track how their business performs, by viewing new members, booked services and other KPIs that matter to them.

keyFeatures.title: Manage bookings and reservations
keyFeatures.content: Easily manage bookings and reservations, view customer data, which professionals will deliver the service and other information.

quote.body: The Umvel team was  quick, on time with everything and delivered an amazing result.

whatWeLearned.title: What we learned
whatWeLearned.content: We helped OEIO to design, build and operate their sports and wellness marketplace, a LATAM first. This SaaS solution spans native apps, a complete admin portal, versatile reporting and other features.

attributes.title: Travel Company
attributes.portfolioDescription: Crafting travel personas for air, cruise and hotel customers.

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.content: A large, international B2B travel services company (1+ billion revenue) tasked us to define customer segmentations for 7 partner brands, in the domains of air, hotel, timeshares, cruise and car rental.The research conducted spanned qualitative (100+ interviews) and quantitative data (500k+ data points). There was a special focus on loyalty and how members are spending travel points and credits.

list.title: Understanding members and their behavior
list.content: We helped our client truly understand their members. What drives them? What’s their decision making process? Why do they choose one travel product over another? A total of 34 personas over 7 brands helped to answers these questions.

list.title: Actionable personas, backed up by data
list.content: Next to qualitative research, we conducted quantitative analysis: through 500,000 data points on purchase and loyalty behavior and cross-referenced these with our qualitative hypotheses and insights. This resulted in very rich personas, backed up by data around ROI, CLV and other metrics.

list.title: Priorization of better ways to earn and spending loyalty points
list.content: As a result of our research, we prioritized potential improvements in the digital journey for all products (air, cruise, hotel, car rental). These were mostly centered around better ways to educate people about earning and spending loyalty points, which ultimately is our client’s main revenue driver.

keyFeatures.title: 34 personas across 7 partner brands
keyFeatures.content: Per brand, we created 4-5 personas, ranging from ‘first-time travelers’ to ‘power members’.

keyFeatures.title: Future travel journeys for all personas
keyFeatures.content: For each persona, we defined the future travel journey, highlighting key improvements for web and mobile.

keyFeatures.title: Opportunity mapping
keyFeatures.content: After aligning business goals with user research, we identified 50 opportunities to improve the travel journeys and stimulate earning and spending of points.

keyFeatures.title: 100+ interviews
keyFeatures.content: We conducted over 100 interviews, in Mexico, the United States and Canada, resulting in awesome insights for constructing personas.

keyFeatures.title: Moderated and unmoderated research
keyFeatures.content: Apart from moderated interviews, we organized unmoderated usability sessions for a UX audit.

whatWeLearned.title: What we learned
whatWeLearned.content: We helped our client to better understand the overall member travel experience and how they’d like to earn and spend loyalty points and credits. Aligned with business goals and internal KPIs, we prioritized journey (design) improvements so that our client can offer better travel services. The team learned everything there is to know about travel behavior, decision factors and ways to create more loyal ‘travel fans’.

attributes.title: CAPA
attributes.portfolioDescription: A fully digital way to invest in real-estate.

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.content: CAPA Management is a real-estate investment manager. They help people to invest in properties and property funds in an easy way, reducing the barrier to enter the investment market. Umvel was asked to design, build and deploy a fully digital investment platform, in which clients can easily manage and track their portfolio growth in every possible way.

list.title: A real-time, digital way to start investing
list.content: Investors can onboard themselves in a digital way, and start investing the same day. This form of self-service allows them to independently explore the real-estate investment world, without requiring assistance.

list.title: Track performance and growth in one place
list.content: The central dashboard enables investors to keep track of asset and fund performance, ARR, MRR and other important financial metrics - all in one place and in real-time.

list.title: Reduction of operational costs and effort
list.content: The new digital platform allows CAPA to reduce cost por customer acquisition, onboarding and operational costs. By offering a real-time, automated view on portfolio performance, our client avoid drafting lengthy quarterly reports (done by hand).

keyFeatures.title: Track all financial metrics for your portfolio
Track all financial metrics for your portfolio

whatWeLearned.title: What we learned
whatWeLearned.content:
Building an investment platform is not easy. The world of real estate investing holds many business rules and business logic to take into account.

Clear and effective information (visual) design is essential, putting the focus on the content primarily. ‘Form follows function’ certainly applies to this project.
